verbs.description: The Trump - Kim Summit [V: was] held on the Singaporean island of Sentosa . According to Singapore ’s National Library , the island suffered from piracy , bloodshed , and fatal disease for most of its history .

[ARG1: The Trump - Kim Summit] was [V: held] [ARGM-LOC: on the Singaporean island of Sentosa] . [ARGM-ADV: According to Singapore ’s National Library] , the island suffered from piracy , bloodshed , and fatal disease for most of its history .
